Question: Shenzhen Forrest Health Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Forrest Health Technology Co., Ltd

Product 1

- The company unveiled their latest consumer electronic products and innovative technologies at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES)
- The product offerings include digital health and AI technologies
- The company showcased advanced imaging solutions, laser display technology, and Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) technology
- The CES 2024 Innovation Awards honorees list includes an AI product from the company

No further relevant information available.
Summary_cn:
深圳福瑞斯特健康科技有限公司

产品1

- 公司在2024年消费电子展 (CES) 上展示了最新的消费电子产品和创新技术
- 产品包括数字健康和人工智能技术
- 公司展示了先进的成像解决方案、激光显示技术和光探测与测距 (LiDAR) 技术
- CES 2024创新奖得主名单中包括了该公司的一款人工智能产品

无其他相关信息。
